channel.title: Homes on Pierce Donovan
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pierce Donovan

item.description: About Me I’m an environmental economist that enjoys applying ideas from ecology, mathematics, and physics in my research. Most of my work focuses on the structural modeling of bioeconomic systems. This Spring, I am traveling to Cambodia to conduct research to support the Wonders of the Mekong program. We are primarily interested in studying the ecological and economic impacts of dam operation on the Mekong River. I also contribute to research for the Glen Canyon Dam Adaptive Management Program at the U.
